snippet: President Obama will deliver a special introduction to the first presentation of a restored print of the classic 1962 movie "To Kill a Mockingbird" on the USA cable network Saturday night.
abstract: President Obama will deliver a special introduction to the first presentation of a restored print of the classic 1962 movie "To Kill a Mockingbird" on the USA cable network Saturday night.

headline.main: Obama to Note Anniversary of 'To Kill a Mockingbird'
headline.print_headline: Movie Milestone: Obama and Atticus Finch
